name: subgraph-template-javascript-apollo-server
description: A template for javascript projects with pre-configured tooling
author: Apollo <watson@apollographql.com>

scripts.start:dev: nodemon --watch "src/**" --ext "ts,json,graphql" --exec "npm run build && npm run start" --ignore ./src/__generated__/ --ignore ./src/datasources/BarAPI.ts
scripts.start:dev-mocked: nodemon --watch "src/**" --ext "ts,json,graphql" --exec "npm run build && npm run start:mocked" --ignore ./__generated__/ --ignore ./src/datasources/BarAPI.ts
